bibdata.title: IRE Standards on Navigation Aids: Direction Finder Measurements, 1959
IRE Standards on Navigation Aids: Direction Finder Measurements, 1959

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Describes the standardisation of measurement methods and procedures to enable the determination of a direction finder's (DF) characteristics which will permit analysis of DF performance in a uniform manner. Standard test conditions are given and test equipment is discussed. Direction finder sensitivity and system accuracy measurements are discussed, and time requirements and interference are considered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
